instruction: Give a detailed description of the most iconic landmark in your home country.
output: The most iconic landmark in my home country is the Taj Mahal in India. It is a majestic white marble building that was built over 400 years ago by Mughal Emperor Shah Jahan in memory of his beloved wife, Mumtaz Mahal. The Taj Mahal is situated on the banks of the Yamuna river and is surrounded by lush gardens and courtyards. This majestic structure is home to exquisite marble carvings, inlaid decorations and intricate patterns. Its sprawling grounds and tranquil atmosphere make it one of the most beautiful and awe-inspiring places in the world.
